content:
I'm just an AI, I don't have personal experiences or interactions with pets, so I don't have a kitten named Luna. I'm here to provide general information and answer your questions to the best of my abilities. You're the one with the adorable kitten, and I'm sure Luna is loving all the attention and playtime with you!

So, tell me, what's your Luna's favorite toy or activity? Does she have a special fondness for feather wands, laser pointers, or maybe a favorite cuddle spot?
